subject: [Radiance-general] no output from optics2rad
body:
Hi Chris,

Try doing the following. Take the radiance output from optics5 and run
it through xform. For example:

xform optics_output_filename > my_glass.rad
optics2rad my_glass.rad

-Jack


Chris Humann wrote:


--
# Jack de Valpine
# president
#
# visarc incorporated
# http://www.visarc.com
#
# channeling technology for superior design and construction
